heroSection.title:
Clean air for
all African cities

subText.fact: 9 out of 10 people breathe polluted air
subText.desc: We empower communities with accurate, hyperlocal and timely air quality data to drive air pollution mitigation actions

airQuality.title: Closing the air quality data gaps in Africa
airQuality.subText: We provide accurate, hyperlocal, and timely air quality data to provide evidence of the magnitude and scale of air pollution across Africa.

list.1: We want cleaner air in all African cities
list.2: We leverage our understanding of the African context

list.1: We empower decision-makers in African cities
list.2: We increase access to air quality data evidence

list.1: We engage city authorities and government agencies
list.2: We empower local leaders with air quality information

list.1: A growing network of individual change makers
list.2: Championing local leaders and demand action

second.title: Free Access To Air Quality Information

list.2: Facilitating access to air quality information

list.1: We engage locals host our deployment activities
list.2: We involve locals in our maintenance drives

monitor.title: High-resolution air quality monitoring network
monitor.subText: We deploy a high-resolution air quality monitoring network in target urban areas across Africa to increase awareness and understanding of air quality management, provide actionable information and derive actions against air pollution

analytics.title: An interactive air quality analytics platform
analytics.subText: Access and visualise real-time and historical air quality information across Africa through our easy-to-use air quality analytics dashboard

apiSection.title: Amplify air quality impact through our API
apiSection.subText: Are you a developer? We invite you to leverage our open-air quality data on your App

mapSection.title: Live air quality insights across Africa
mapSection.subText: Visualize hourly air quality information with a single click, over our growing network across African cities
